blogPost.excerpt: Watch Something helps you find great movies or TV shows to watch on Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Prime. But instead of recommending 1000 mediocre options, Watch Something provides 3 great, highly rated options (you can load more), based on the user preferred genre.
blogPost.body: Watch Something helps you find great movies or TV shows to watch on Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Prime. But instead of recommending 1000 mediocre options, Watch Something provides 3 great, highly rated options (you can load more), based on the user preferred genre.
blogPost.title: Watch Something - Discover what to watch on Netflix, Amazon and Hulu
blogPost.author: Gal Vered

localize.description: Watch Something 帮助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上观看的优秀电影或电视节目。但是，Watch Something不是推荐1000个平庸的选项，而是根据用户喜欢的类型，提供3个伟大的、高评价的选项（你可以加载更多）。
localize.tagline: 发现在Netflix、亚马逊和Hulu上看什么？

localize.description: Watch Something 幫助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上觀看的優秀電影或電視節目。但是，Watch Something不是推薦1000個平庸的選項，而是根據用戶喜歡的類型，提供3個偉大的、高評價的選項（你可以加載更多）。
localize.tagline: 發現在Netflix、亞馬遜和Hulu上看什麼？
